text: A Time for Drunken Horses (; , Zamani baray√© masti asbha) is 2000 Iranian movie directed by Bahman Ghobadi and starring Ayoub Ahmadi, Rojin Younessi, Amaneh Ekhtiar-dini, Madi Ekhtiar-dini, Karim Ekhtiar-dini. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:2000 movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Bahman Ghobadi
title: A Time for Drunken Horses
